snippet: Friday’s highlights from around the Web include an examination of the psychology at play that makes the mobile game Candy Crush so popular. Plus, the evolution of bots, which increasingly do more than issue spam.
abstract: Friday’s highlights from around the Web include an examination of the psychology at play that makes the mobile game Candy Crush so popular. Plus, the evolution of bots, which increasingly do more than issue spam.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Understanding Candy Crush Addictions, the Rise of Twitter Bots and #SFBatkid
